title: P.A.M. Dirac and the Development of Modern General Relativity
abstract: I provide a very brief sketch of Dirac's Hamiltonian formulation of Einstein's theory, in its relation both to his own earlier work and to contemporary developments.
publication: International Journal of Modern Physics A
